t:
I rushed to my sister's house as soon as I received her frantic call. But when I reached, I found her husband standing over her limp body, knife in hand.



“Did we do it?” I asked.
He nodded and pulled me
                         in for a kiss.
c:
He's no idea, he'll be my next victim.



#sister #boyfriend #death #murder #knife #trustbroken #tricked #betrayal





I originally thought of ending this with...
“Did you do it?” I asked. He nodded and pulled me in for a kiss.
... to keep things ambiguous.
